staff of five employees three of whom I personally hired and trained Received commendation for ability to handle problems and communicate effectively and professionally Acquired premium receipt process Gained proficiency in personal computer workstations Responsible for oversight of personal hardware repair throughout the Kansas City location including troubleshooting of 2000 PCs and
